reporter_caption.center: PEOPLE EX REL. SLOFSKY v. HEROLD, 34 A.D.2d 1041 [3d Dept 1970]

caption.center: THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK ex rel. LARRY SLOFSKY, Appellant, v.
ROSS E. HEROLD, as Director of Dannemora State Hospital, Respondent.

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, Third Department.

opinion.opinion_text: MEMORANDUM BY THE COURT. Relator having been transferred from Dannemora State Hospital, the appeal is dismissed as academic, without costs. Reynolds, J.P., Staley, Jr., Greenblott, Cooke and Sweeney, JJ., concur.
